author: trygvis
msg: o As with the CVS provider make sure the content is checked out directly under
the working directory and not inside a new directory under the working

author: trygvis
msg: o Aligning with changes from the API.
o The stream consumers now uses the Plexus Logger and not System.err which
really isn't a useful way of debugging.
o When checking out code the content is checked out into the working directory
and not "<working directory>/<module name>". This is much more managable and is
hopefully a more compatible with SCM that doesn't have a "module" consept.
o The tag command now returns the command output properly inside a TagScmResult.

author: trygvis
msg: o Deprecating methods thats will be removed.
- getMessage() is replaced with getProviderMessage(). This is the message
from the provider when something fails.
- getLongMessage() is replaced with getCommandOutput(). If the provided
executed some external command this is the output from that command.
o Making the AbstractCommand extend AbstractLogEnabled.
